nodes.bodyText: Shall we also describe Client-certificates, Endpoint-certificates and Image in this table?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -397,10 +428,9 @@ WSO2 API Controller (**apictl**) allows you to create and deploy APIs without us To add custom sequences, save them in XML format and add them to the corresponding folder. For example, to add a custom in-sequence, save the custom sequence as SampleSequence.xml and add it to the Sequences/in-sequence/directory. - 
Docs
-      |── FileContents
+ 
Docs
- Contains the documents. To add a new document, add the document in the Docs/FileContents/directory. + Contains the documents.
